Subject: New alert when pushing upgrade from EP console; need to suppress alert.
Description: I upgraded our admin console today (9/17/24) to 5.9.4.0.  After I upgraded the console I then pushed the latest Windows version of EP (6.2.3.1010) using the "Client Software Upgrade" feature in the admin console.  During the upgrade to my computer a new popup alerted me to an "End User Agreement"  that prompted me to accept.  Please help me disable the popup as I do not want all 1000+ users to be alarmed during the upgrade and require them to push the "I accept" button.
Solution_Comment__c: Informed the customer that the EULA only pops-up on the EPP Server and no need to worry about the client upgrade.
